title: "Data Dictionary"

## Overview

This page documents the schema and structure of tables in the **{{ cookiecutter.project_name }}** data product.

## Tables

### example_staging

Staging table with initial data transformations.

| Column | Type | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| id | INTEGER | Unique identifier |
| name | VARCHAR | Record name |
| created_at | TIMESTAMP | Creation timestamp |

**Location**: `s3://{{ cookiecutter.s3_bucket }}/{{ cookiecutter.project_name }}/staging/example_staging/*.parquet`

### example_data_mart

Business-ready aggregated data.

| Column | Type | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| category | VARCHAR | Category name |
| count | INTEGER | Number of records |
| last_updated | TIMESTAMP | Last update time |

**Location**: `s3://{{ cookiecutter.s3_bucket }}/{{ cookiecutter.project_name }}/data_mart/example_data_mart/*.parquet`

## Data Lineage

```{mermaid}
flowchart TD
    A[Source Data] --> B[example_staging]
    B --> C[example_data_mart]
```

## Refresh Schedule

- **Frequency**: On-demand
- **Method**: `./run.sh` or SQLMesh plan + export

## Data Quality

Data quality checks are implemented in the SQLMesh models. See the model files in the `models/` directory for details.
